typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	store: 'synapseanalytics',
	schemaName: 'dbo',
	tableName: 'G215OMWest',
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	staged: true) ~> G215OMWestInAzureSynapse
source(output(
		YEAR as double,
		PERIOD as double,
		DATES as timestamp,
		HOLIDAY as string,
		CHECKSUM as string,
		WEEK_GROUP as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	fileSystem: 'raw',
	folderPath: 'iFlight',
	fileName: 'PERIOD_CONTROL_PERIODS.parquet') ~> PeriodList
